name: Gomorrah entrance guard

topics.topic_text: Here you go. <Hand over all weapons>
topics.response_text: You'll get these back on your way out.
You'll get these back on your way out.
Then get the fuck out of here.

topics.topic_text: Sorry, no one parts me from my weapons.
topics.response_text: You sure you want it to go down this way? You're going to have every Omerta in this place jumping down your throat.
All right, this is going to be fun.
All right, come back any time.
Hey, no one but Omertas are allowed to carry guns into Gomorrah! Check your weapons with me.

description:
Gomorrah Entrance Guard is a 32 year-old Caucasian Male.

A tough-looking Omerta gang member who stands guard at the entrance of Gomorrah casino. He scans newcomers with a practiced eye, ready to enforce the casino's strict no-weapon policy.

Gomorrah Entrance Guard's Personality: Tough, intimidating, and corrupt. The guard takes pride in his position and enjoys the small power it gives him over the casino's visitors. He's suspicious by nature and quick to spot anyone trying to bypass the security measures.

Gomorrah Entrance Guard's Backstory: Born and raised in the New Vegas area, this man has been with the Omerta family for over a decade. He started as an enforcer for smaller operations before earning his post at Gomorrah's entrance. He's seen countless gamblers, hustlers, and troublemakers come and go, developing a cynical worldview that serves him well in his role. He's loyal to the Omertas not out of principle, but because they've given him a position of authority in the chaotic wasteland.
